alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Johnston; Nash; Wake; Wayne; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:31PM EDT until August 15 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Wayne County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Nash County in central North Carolina... East central Wake County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Central Johnston County in central North Carolina... South central Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 531 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Zebulon to near Clayton to 6 miles southwest of Smithfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Clayton, Zebulon, Fremont, Bailey, Micro, Selma, Wendell, Four Oaks and Pine Level. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Johnston; Nash; Wake; Wayne; Wilson
